project.title: [Client Redacted] - Cloud Service Delivery

challenge.summary: Manage and harmonize cloud services during mergers and acquisitions while consolidating multiple Managed Service Providers (MSPs) and ensuring consistency across integrated entities.

deliverables: Vendor management and consolidation of MSPs
Training and change management for staff and end-users
Governance model establishment for centralized management

outcomes: ✅ Enhanced service efficiency and consistency across organization
✅ Significant cost savings through MSP consolidation
